ofAdjustment(float, float, float) - Method in class net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.ColorX

Gets the integer value of the gray-scale of this ColorX, based on the specified GrayscaleMode.
ofInversion(float) - Method in class net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.ColorX
Gets the integer value of this ColorX as if its values were tending toward inversion.

Gets the integer value of this ColorX as if its lightness were altered.
